paper.title: An Empirical Study of Financial Pre-Warning Indicators Based on the Filter-Wrapper SVM Algorithm
paper.abstract: In view of the weakness of traditional financial pre-warning indicators system which is established relying more on personal experience, this paper adopts a feature selection method which combined Filter with Wrapper SVM algorithm and it is used to gain a pivotal feature subset which is highly correlative with the financial risk. The result of experiments shows that the pivotal feature subset selected by this algorithm could make the classification accuracy higher. Meanwhile, the dimension of pivotal feature subset is obviously smaller than the original set.

domain_result.justification: 该论文的核心技术是使用Filter-Wrapper SVM算法进行特征选择，以构建财务预警指标系统，目的是提高财务风险的分类准确性。这直接关联到金融风险管理中的风险识别和预警。
